summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMorphe's Lightform Extended Hydration Foundation is a weightless, second skin foundation with buildable medium coverage that's clinically proven to improve skin's natural radiance, hydration, and barrier function in just one week.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates skin immediately and for up to 16 hours*Improves skin radiance, hydration & barrier function after 1 weekLongwearing, sweatproof & waterproof*Based on a 16-hour clinical study of 31 consumersFeaturesBuildable medium coverageNatural radiant finishMade in ItalyResearch ResultsImmediately:96% of users agreed Lightform provides buildable medium coverage & a second-skin effect*96% of users agreed Lightform feels comfortable, breathable & flexible throughout wear*93% of users agreed Lightform reduces the appearance of blemishes & minimizes the appearance of pores*After One Week:93% of users agreed Lightform makes their skin feel softer*90% of users agreed Lightform makes skin look heathier & smoother*87% of users agreed Lightform makes skin appear refreshed, well-rested & more luminous**Based on an independent consumer study of 32 subjects after 1 week of useItem 2621364How To UseGently shake bottle for best results. Apply skincare & a primer or CSM+ for the perfectly prepped skin.Dispense one pump of foundation onto the large end of the Dual Ended Complexion Brush or damp beauty sponge.Press into skin starting at the center of your face and buff outward for a naturally diffused finish.To build overall coverage, add another pump buff into skin.For targeted coverage, use the smaller end of the brush or pointed tip of the sponge to stipple more foundation to desired areas.Set foundation with CSM+ to amplify longevity & radiance of foundation or Bake & Set Setting Powder for a soft matte finish.Continuous Prep & Set Setting Mist+ (CSM+), Dual Ended Complexion Brush & Bake & Set Setting Powder sold separately.IngredientsMedium 11N: Water (Aqua, Eau), Dimethicone, Isoamyl Laurate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Phenylisopropyl Dimethicone, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Glycerin, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Fructose, Sodium Hydroxide, Urea, Allantoin, Maltose, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Trehalose, Glucose, Tocopherol, Aluminum Hydroxide. May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Gently shake bottle for best results. Apply skincare & a primer or CSM+ for the perfectly prepped skin.Dispense one pump of foundation onto the large end of the Dual Ended Complexion Brush or damp beauty sponge.Press into skin starting at the center of your face and buff outward for a naturally diffused finish.To build overall coverage, add another pump buff into skin.For targeted coverage, use the smaller end of the brush or pointed tip of the sponge to stipple more foundation to desired areas.Set foundation with CSM+ to amplify longevity & radiance of foundation or Bake & Set Setting Powder for a soft matte finish.Continuous Prep & Set Setting Mist+ (CSM+), Dual Ended Complexion Brush & Bake & Set Setting Powder sold separately.

reviews.headline: Pump is a mess, texture is bad
reviews.comments: The dispenser on this bottle is too small, there's no way to get foundation on your face without also getting foundation all over the bottle. I've stained multiple outfits now from foundation getting everywhere. Also this foundation highlights all of my skin's texture because the consistency is runny. I have used this for months trying to give it another chance but it does not get better. Also there isn't a great shade range.

reviews.headline: Highlights texture good feel
reviews.comments: I bought it because I had a color match (has decent olive shades) however I realized it does emphasize skin texture more. If you have dry skin the foundation does feel nice without it being too heavy.

reviews.headline: Had to return. Hated it.
reviews.comments: Man I wanted to love this foundation, but before I even put it on my face I hated it. It was sooooooooo runny. I mean soooo runny. Then put it on my face and it was horrible. I had to return it. I do love the Morphe eye shadows though. Very pigmented.

reviews.headline: disappointed
reviews.comments: I loved how this foundation looked for the first month of wearing it but after a while it started to break me out badly, don't recommend if you have acnd prone skin!!!

reviews.headline: Looks natural!!
reviews.comments: This foundation is amazing! If you get your proper shade it seriously looks like nothing is there! I 100% recommend! Very light weight aswell!

reviews.headline: Love this foundation
reviews.comments: Best foundation I've tried at this price point. Wears great, full coverage without settling into lines. I put my makeup on around 6:30 am and it still looks amazing g when I'm done at four. Definitely on my list of repeat buys.

reviews.headline: Morphe help me please
reviews.comments: My daughter and I have used the filter effect foundation and it's now discontinued,we have this a shot while I don't love this lightform I don't completely dislike it but I'm not sure if it's the formula or the dispensing pump but it makes a huge mess

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: I am almost 45 years old, and this has been the best foundation I have found!  It is hydrating, has flawless coverage, smooth snd silky to put on. I thought i would have to useca different foundation for the summer, but it still gives me the perfect amount of hydration for the summer.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again!
reviews.comments:
I recently purchased the Morphe Lightform foundation and I must ask where has this been all my life!  I actually went into the store to get color matched for another product and changed my mind after seeing the model advertised wearing this.  The store clerk pulled (3) different shades before matching with the one I actually needed and preferred.  Actually while looking at the bottles, I picked the right shade but she wanted to try something else which turned out to be to dark for me.  The shade I needed glided on smooth and matched my skin perfectly.  So much so that it blended in perfectly with the makeup I already had on.

I also purchased a Bronzer which I am hoping will work for me.  I am getting ready for my daughters wedding and my face needs to be on point for photos!  Thank you Morphe for coming into my life. Oh not to forget, my granddaughrer swears by this product but just forgot to tell me about it.

We have a winner here!

reviews.headline: spills so bad
reviews.comments: the fondation is pretty good it is a little cakey. But it leaks so bad. Like I have to have it standing up or it will be all over the bottle

reviews.headline: Not good
reviews.comments: Awful coverage, break outs

reviews.headline: I BEEN LOOKING FOR THIS EVERYWHERE AGAIN
reviews.comments: THIS FOUNDATION WORKED WONDERS FOR ME AND I GOT COMPLIMENTS WHILE I USED THEM,   THEN WHEN I COULDNT FIND THEM ANYMORE AT THE STORES,  I WAS DISSAPPOINTED.  NOW I KNOW THEY ARE STILL SELLING THIS AT THIS STORE NEAR ME.  I CANT WAIT TO BUY MORE OF IT   I COULDNT COMPARE IT TO ANY OTHER FOUNDATIONS I TRIED   I REALLLY NEED TO GET BACK ON MORPHE ASAP

reviews.headline: Best foundation
reviews.comments: Bought this foundation awhile ago i usually switch foundations very often because i can never find anything that works for me or my skin, tried this foundation out a frw months ago and its my favorite thing ever ! My skin isnt perfect but this is literally like a filter for my face ! I mever write reviews but i saw how little reviews this had and was confused because it's genuinely such a good product actually noticed my skin clear up after usuing it too even my gfs noticed if you have oily skin and a hard time finding neutral shades give this brand a go ! So worth it

reviews.headline: too thick
reviews.comments: much too thick on mature skin

reviews.headline: Love it makes my skin look flawless
reviews.comments: Love this product will definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: I will totally buy this again
reviews.comments: Im really surprised I havnt tried this before. I have tried a variety of foundations and usually struggle with cakey looks, flashback, and texture. And honestly so glad I tried this I think I will be hooked no issues great match and feel.

reviews.headline: Bring back the old formula
reviews.comments: I used to love the Morphy foundation the soft filter effect they've changed it to this and it is so liquidy. It is the worst bring back what you had. I used it for years and years and now I'm gonna have to find something else I can't use this.

reviews.headline: surprisingly really really good
reviews.comments: I got this in my boxy charm and tried and fell in love! The finish is so beautiful not too glowy and not too matte, feels great on the skin, and lasts so long! it applies like a skin tint and sets like a foundation

reviews.headline: best first-time choice!
reviews.comments: I really thought this shade would not fit but I realized how much a little can go a long way!! I love the lightweight formula, and since I don't wear it everyday it's very comfortable to wear for long periods. Would TOTALLY recommend ü•∞

reviews.headline: Worthless
reviews.comments: I truly thought i would love this foundation because its lightweight and can help hydrate your skin but its really not good‚Ä¶.it just shows on my skin as splotchy and not smooth at all. My skin looks horrible with it

faceoff_positive.comments:
Having recently tried Morphe's Lightform Extended Hydration Foundation, I'm eager to share my thoughts on this product that promises buildable medium coverage and a natural radiant finish. 

The first thing that caught my attention was the lightweight feel of the foundation. It effortlessly glides onto the skin, and the buildable medium coverage allows for a customized look. Whether you're aiming for a more natural appearance or desiring a bit more coverage, this foundation adapts seamlessly.

The hydration factor is a standout feature. Throughout the day, my skin maintained a comfortable and hydrated feel, which is often hard to achieve with foundations. The formula strikes a great balance, providing coverage without compromising on skin moisture, making it suitable for various skin types.

The natural radiant finish is indeed as promised. It imparts a healthy glow without being overly dewy, giving the skin a luminous and fresh appearance. It's a fantastic choice for those who appreciate a radiant finish without the need for additional highlighters.

I also appreciate the diversity of shades available, ensuring that there's an option for various skin tones. Finding the right shade is crucial for a seamless and natural look, and Morphe seems to understand and cater to that need.

The longevity of the foundation impressed me. It held up well throughout the day, maintaining its coverage and radiance without settling into fine lines or feeling heavy on the skin.

The packaging is practical, with a pump dispenser that allows for easy and hygienic application. It's a thoughtful design element that adds to the overall user experience.

In conclusion, Morphe's Lightform Extended Hydration Foundation is a noteworthy addition to the world of foundations. I got the product for free in exchange for writing the review .With its lightweight feel, buildable coverage, hydration benefits, and a natural radiant finish, it's a solid choice for those seeking a foundation that performs well on multiple fronts. Whether you're into a minimal makeup look or prefer a more glam appearance, this foundation has the versatility to meet your needs.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best hydrating foundation

faceoff_negative.comments:
Ok so.. 
i found this foundation last summer the price was right for every day work use it would cost me cents a day to wear to work I bought this foundation because I didn't want to use my good expensive foundation for every day work use. It worked well for what I was using it for it did cover my spots and my red i have on my cheeks.when I first used it. I noticed it would come off on anything you have by your face. I have to wear collar shirts for work and it would come off on my collar shirt a lot. setting spray wouldn't even work to keep the foundation on my skin, but because the price was right I kept using it almost finished my first bottle. I noticed my skin was becoming very, very dry. I have dry skin ready, but this foundation said for dry skin. It would hydrate my skin. That's why I tried it. Also, it actually did the opposite. It dried out my skin, even more to the point where it made my skin flaky I didn't understand why my skin got like that. I didn't think it was the foundation so I kept using it and finished a whole bottle when I got to the next new bottle that I bought I noticed it was getting worse so it dawned on me could it be the foundation that's causing my skin to be extremely dry and flaky so I tested it out and stop using the product it's been two weeks already not using this product and my skin is going back to normal I'm not oily at all. I just have dry skin, but this product made my skin extremely dry and flaky after stop using this product for two weeks. My skin is back to normal no more flaky skin so it comes down to this product. Was the problem making my skin very very dry. I would not recommend this product if you have dry skin, maybe if you have oily skin because then it will dry up your skin, but if you have dry skin stay far away from this product your skin will be become flaky. it was embarrassing. Now I'm using my good foundation with no problems so don't waste your money. Spend a little more and get a better quality foundation.
faceoff_negative.headline: Dried out my skin
